# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          | Status                                  |
| ------- | ------------------ | --------------------------------------- |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: | Actively receiving security updates       |
| < Unsupported Versions >   | :x:                | No longer supported with security updates |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of YouTube-AI-Navigator-Browser-Extension seriously. If you discover any security vulnerability, we appreciate your help in disclosing it to us in a responsible manner.

Please do not publicly disclose these details without prior agreement.

To report a vulnerability, please email chirag127[@]pm.me with the following information:

*   Description of the vulnerability
*   Steps to reproduce
*   Affected versions
*   Potential impact

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and will provide an estimated timeline for addressing the issue. We aim to address security vulnerabilities promptly.

## Disclosure Policy

When we receive a security vulnerability report, we will:

*   Validate the vulnerability and assess its impact.
*   Issue a fix and deploy it.
*   Publicly disclose the vulnerability after a fix has been released, providing credit to the reporter (unless they wish to remain anonymous).

## Safe Harbor

We appreciate the efforts of security researchers and aim to avoid any legal action against those who:

*   Share with us the full details of the vulnerability.
*   Make a good faith effort to avoid privacy violations, destruction of data, and interruption or degradation of our services.
*   Do not exploit the vulnerability for any reason other than to validate the security issue.
*   Provide us a reasonable time to address the issue before making any information public.

Thank you for helping us keep YouTube-AI-Navigator-Browser-Extension secure!
